name: Cube Inversion
description:
Cube Inversion is a game in which you have, managing only one cube, pass a set of puzzles, and the reaction tasks. Use the Shift and Ctrl to switch between the 2 worlds: black and white. You can not be afraid that the game ever end, because we will produce constant updates with new levels and features.

Control

W - Jump

A and D - Movement to the left or right

Shift - Moving in the white world

Ctrl - Moving in the black world

F - The interaction with the objects
